resources.string: This app aims to provide a clear introduction in Python. through short descriptions and code snippets. at the end of every tutorial you will find a link to a video discussion (in arabic). feel free to leave any feedback and happy coding.

Python is a general purpose, dynamic, interpreted programming language with no type declaration. which is used for :
Web Development (Django)
Data Analysis (NumPy)
 Machine Learning (TensorFlow)
Computer Vision (OpenCV)
IOT (Raspberry PI)
Game Development (PyGame)
JVM (Jython)
